trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays a list of data items.
trans-unit.target: 表示显示的数据项列表的控件。

trans-unit.source: ListView is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: ListView 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，这意味着它可以包含的任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板） 的对象的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The presentation of the data items in a ListView is defined by its view mode, which is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在 ListView 中数据项的呈现方式由其视图模式中，由指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode that partitions the ListView data item content into columns.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>分区到列的列表视图数据项内容的视图模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties and methods on <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and its related classes style and specify the content of the columns.
trans-unit.target: 属性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>及其相关的类设置样式，以及指定的列的内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a ListView with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了与 ListView<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: ![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output") You can also define custom views by creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.
trans-unit.target: ![具有 GridView 输出的 ListView](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "具有 GridView 输出的 ListView")还可以通过创建从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>派生的类来定义自定义视图

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 为 ListView 创建自定义视图模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you define a custom <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> for a ListView control and also define an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>, you must include a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你定义的自定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>对于 ListView 控制，还可定义<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>，则必须包括<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is required for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>需要<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>正常工作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: To avoid alignment issues in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, do not add content or set properties that affect the width of an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> of a ListView.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免中的对齐方式问题<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>查看模式但不添加内容或设置影响中的项的宽度的属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>的 ListView。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To prevent alignment issues, use properties and templates that are defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止对齐问题，请使用属性和为定义的模板<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This includes properties and templates that are defined for classes that are used in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: 这包括属性和为在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图模式，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader></xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn></xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>中使用的类定义的模板

trans-unit.source: Two ListView controls cannot share the same view.
trans-unit.target: 两个 ListView 控件不能共享同一个视图。

trans-unit.source: To specify a view that can be used more than one time, use templates or styles.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定可以使用一次以上的视图，使用模板或样式。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and other custom views that are defined as reusable resources, see [ListView with Multiple Views Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160013).
trans-unit.target: 有关的示例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>和其他自定义视图定义为可重用的资源，请参阅[与多个视图示例 ListView](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160013)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> properties for ListView content that is displayed by using a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A>的 ListView 内容显示通过使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the alignment of content in a column of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>，定义一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>列中的内容的对齐方式

trans-unit.source: Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: 显示大量的项可能会导致性能问题。

trans-unit.source: See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[优化性能︰ 控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ListView Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ListView controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ListView 控件到自定义适用于多个 ListView 控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ListView, see [ListView Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于 ListView 的状态，请参阅[ListView 样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ListView control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在 ListView 控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Removes all templates, styles, and bindings for the object that is displayed as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 删除所有模板、 样式和显示为对象的绑定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> container to clear.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>要清除容器。

trans-unit.source: The object that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> contains.
trans-unit.target: 对象的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>包含。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> container.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>容器。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 确定对象是否为<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要评估的对象。

trans-unit.source: if the item is a ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if the item is a ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Defines an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 定义<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>为<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>对象<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Responds to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.OnItemsChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 响应<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.OnItemsChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when there is a change in the items collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 项集合中的更改时调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the styles, templates, and bindings for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 设置样式、 模板以及绑定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method prepares a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control for display according to the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将准备<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>控件用于显示根据指定的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: An object that is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> or that can be converted into one.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>或，可以转换成一个。

trans-unit.source: The object to use to create the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要用于创建的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that defines how the data is styled and organized in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个定义如何样式和组织中的数据对象<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] environment includes the configurable view mode named <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)]环境包括名为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>的可配置的视图模式

trans-unit.source: You can also create a custom view that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以创建继承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>的自定义视图

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 为 ListView 创建自定义视图模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| > [!NOTE] > The type of property metadata for this property is , not .
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性的属性元数据的类型是，而不.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"></xref> object that specifies how to display information in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"> </xref>对象，它指定如何显示中的信息<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
